1 Samuel or 1 Kings__20.5__Tomorrow is the new moon: : The neomenia, or first day of the moon, kept according to the law, as a festival; and therefore Saul feasted on that day: and expected the attendance of his family.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__20.15__May he take away Jonathan: : It is a curse upon himself, if he should not be faithful to his promise.-- Ibid.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__20.15__Require it: : That is, revenge it upon David's enemies, and upon me, if I should fail of my word given to him.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__20.31__The son of death: : That is, one that deserveth death, and shall surely be put to death.
